title: New free champion rotation: Ezreal, Janna, Jayce and more!

replies.body: i think kha is in the lowest of bottom tiers of characters in this game

Just realized that {{champion:107}}  and {{champion:121}}  are always in the same free week rotation. It has been going on for a long time now. I guess it has something to do with 'The hunt is on'. Very nice timing since im planning on buying one of them :D

when will nami , akali or diana be free to play i've been waiting over a month and it is very disappointing seeing ezreal and janna always being on every weeks free to play champion rotation. disappointing riot -..- {{item:3070}}

why???
the week before last i brought {{champion:72}}  then free week for him 
last week i brought {{champion:40}}  and again free week
:(
